questions.title: I am the first woman to win a Nobel Prize in 1911...
questions.bio:
Physicist and chemist
She discovered radioactivity and invented
a mobile X-ray unit that was used during World War I.
questions.photoCredit: Picture credit : Internet Archive Book Images/Flickr Commons

questions.title: Watson and Crick discovered the molecular structure of DNA because of some pictures I took...
questions.bio:
***Chemist
She took the first picture of DNA
using X-ray crystallography. This lead
to the discovery of DNA's double helix structure.
questions.photoCredit: Picture credit : MRC Laboratory of Molecular Biology

questions.bio:
Mathematician and writer
She is the first computer programmer 
— long before modern computers were invented.
